42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Apostle of AllSah(ﷺ) as saying:Every son of Adam will be devoured by the earth with the exception of the tail-bone from which he was created and from which he will be reconstituted

chapter.eng-name: The Resurrection And The Blowing Of The Trumpet
